XIV.7.1.d
.
Responsibility for Processing Cases Involving Beneficiaries in Receipt of Pension or DIC
The pension management centers (PMC) are responsible for processing the worksheets referenced in
M21-1, Part XIV, 7.1.b
, if the
beneficiary is in receipt of pension or DIC, or
Veteran is entitled to compensation but is receiving pension as the greater benefit.
Reference
:Â  For more information on the jurisdiction of each PMC, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, 1.B.2.b
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 7 - Data-Matching Programs That Identify Incarcerated Beneficiaries and Dependents
